Segment.name: X2
Segment.comment: To transmit import license number and effective dates

Field.name: ImportLicenseNumber1
Field.comment: Government assigned identification number for importer of foreign shipments

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: ImportLicenseNumber2
Field.comment: Government assigned identification number for importer of foreign shipments

Field.name: Date3
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Date4
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year
